title: [PBE LCU] Store Delay
body: There's  a very noticeable lag between the price notifier and the item unlocked notifier. It's the first time I had this issue playing on the PBE ever since I switched to LCU and as a result of this lag/delay the notifier's components sometimes spawn behind the boxes of say champions/skins/wards/runes and I have had to click it in order  to bring it to the front. {{summoner:1}}

replies.body: Can you share a screenshot please? thanks!
